description:
A secret recording. Damaging headlines. Allegations of “treason.”  For Azerbaijan, host of the COP29 climate talks opening in the capital Baku on Monday, reports that a senior official had apparently used his position on the organising team to pursue oil and gas deals might seem like a public relations disaster. But President Ilham Aliyev, who […]

The post Meet Teneo: The Global PR Firm Promoting COP29 Host Azerbaijan as a Climate Champion appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Meet Teneo: The Global PR Firm Promoting COP29 Host Azerbaijan as a Climate Champion
